executable.title: Brain Landmark Constellation Detector (BRAINS)
executable.description: This program will find the mid-sagittal plane, a constellation of landmarks in a volume, and create an AC/PC aligned data set with the AC point at the center of the voxel lattice (labeled at the origin of the image physical space.) Part of this work is an extention of the algorithms originally described by Dr. Babak A. Ardekani, Alvin H. Bachman, Model-based automatic detection of the anterior and posterior commissures on MRI scans, NeuroImage, Volume 46, Issue 3, 1 July 2009, Pages 677-682, ISSN 1053-8119, DOI: 10.1016/j.neuroimage.2009.02.030. (http://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/B6WNP-4VRP25C-4/2/8207b962a38aa83c822c6379bc43fe4c)
executable.contributor: Hans J. Johnson (hans-johnson -at- uiowa.edu), Ali Ghayoor
executable.acknowledgements: Hans Johnson(1,2,3); Ali Ghayoor(3); Wei Lu(3) 1=University of Iowa Department of Psychiatry, 2=University of Iowa Department of Biomedical Engineering, 3=University of Iowa Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering

integer.name: houghEyeDetectorMode
integer.label: Hough Eye Detector Mode
integer.description: This flag controls the mode of Hough eye detector. By default, value of 1 is for T1W images, while the value of 0 is for T2W and PD images.

file.name: llsModel
file.label: Input LLS Model in HD5 format
file.description: Linear least squares model filename in HD5 format

image.name: inputVolume
image.label: Input Volume Filename
image.description: Input image in which to find ACPC points

image.name: outputVolume
image.label: Output Volume Filename
image.description: ACPC-aligned output image with the same voxels as the input image, but updated origin, and direction cosign so that the AC point would fall at the physical location (0.0,0.0,0.0), and the mid-sagital plane is the plane where physical L/R coordinate is 0.0. No interpolation method is involved to create the "outputVolume", and this output image is created using "resample in place" filter.

image.name: outputResampledVolume
image.label: Output Resampled Volume Filename
image.description: ACPC-aligned output image in a resampled uniform isotropic space. Currently this is a 1mm, 256^3 image with identity direction cosign. Choose desired interpolation mode to generate the outputResampledVolume.

transform.name: outputTransform
transform.label: Output Transform
transform.description: The filename for the original space to ACPC alignment to be written (in .h5 format).

file.name: outputLandmarksInInputSpace
file.label: Output Landmarks in Input Space
file.description: The filename for the new subject-specific landmark definition file in the same format produced by Slicer3 (.fcsv) with the landmarks in the original image space (the detected RP, AC, PC, and VN4) in it to be written.

file.name: outputLandmarksInACPCAlignedSpace
file.label: Output Landmarks in ACPC Aligned Space
file.description: The filename for the new subject-specific landmark definition file in the same format produced by Slicer3 (.fcsv) with the landmarks in the output image space (the detected RP, AC, PC, and VN4) in it to be written.

file.name: outputMRML
file.label: Output MRML Filename
file.description: The filename for the new subject-specific scene definition file in the same format produced by Slicer3 (in .mrml format). Only the components that were specified by the user on command line would be generated. Compatible components include inputVolume, outputVolume, outputLandmarksInInputSpace, outputLandmarksInACPCAlignedSpace, and outputTransform.

file.name: outputVerificationScript
file.label: outputVerificationScript
file.description: The filename for the Slicer3 script that verifies the aligned landmarks against the aligned image file. This will happen only in conjunction with saveOutputLandmarks and an outputVolume.

integer.name: mspQualityLevel
integer.label: mspQualityLevel
integer.description: Flag cotrols how agressive the MSP is estimated. 0=quick estimate (9 seconds), 1=normal estimate (11 seconds), 2=great estimate (22 seconds), 3=best estimate (58 seconds), NOTE: -1= Prealigned so no estimate!.

double.name: otsuPercentileThreshold
double.label: otsuPercentileThreshold
double.description: This is a parameter to FindLargestForegroundFilledMask, which is employed when acLowerBound is set and an outputUntransformedClippedVolume is requested.

double.name: acLowerBound
double.label: acLowerBound
double.description: When generating a resampled output image, replace the image with the BackgroundFillValue everywhere below the plane This Far in physical units (millimeters) below (inferior to) the AC point (as found by the model.) The oversize default was chosen to have no effect. Based on visualizing a thousand masks in the IPIG study, we recommend a limit no smaller than 80.0 mm.

boolean.name: cutOutHeadInOutputVolume
boolean.label: cutOutHeadInOutputVolume
boolean.description: Flag to cut out just the head tissue when producing an (un)transformed clipped volume.

image.name: outputUntransformedClippedVolume
image.label: Output Raw Clipped Image Volume Filename
image.description: Output image in which to store neck-clipped input image, with the use of --acLowerBound and maybe --cutOutHeadInUntransformedVolume.

boolean.name: rescaleIntensities
boolean.label: rescaleIntensities
boolean.description: Flag to turn on rescaling image intensities on input.

double.name: trimRescaledIntensities
double.label: trimRescaledIntensities
double.description: Turn on clipping the rescaled image one-tailed on input. Units of standard deviations above the mean. Very large values are very permissive. Non-positive value turns clipping off. Defaults to removing 0.00001 of a normal tail above the mean.

integer-vector.name: rescaleIntensitiesOutputRange
integer-vector.label: rescaleIntensitiesOutputRange
integer-vector.description: This pair of integers gives the lower and upper bounds on the signal portion of the output image. Out-of-field voxels are taken from BackgroundFillValue.

string.name: backgroundFillValueString
string.description: Fill the background of image with specified short int value. Enter number or use BIGNEG for a large negative number.
string.label: Background Fill Value

string-enumeration.name: interpolationMode
string-enumeration.label: Interpolation Mode
string-enumeration.description: Type of interpolation to be used when applying transform to moving volume to create OutputResampledVolume. Options are Linear, NearestNeighbor, BSpline, or WindowedSinc

parameters.label: Manual Override
parameters.description: Manually force the location of the points in original image space.

float-vector.name: forceACPoint
float-vector.label: forceACPoint
float-vector.description: Manually specify the AC point from the original image in RAS coordinates (i.e. Slicer coordinates).

float-vector.name: forcePCPoint
float-vector.label: forcePCPoint
float-vector.description: Manually specify the PC point from the original image in RAS coordinates (i.e. Slicer coordinates).

float-vector.name: forceVN4Point
float-vector.label: forceVN4Point
float-vector.description: Manually specify the VN4 point from the original image in RAS coordinates (i.e. Slicer coordinates).

float-vector.name: forceRPPoint
float-vector.label: forceRPPoint
float-vector.description: Manually specify the RP point from the original image in RAS coordinates (i.e. Slicer coordinates).

file.name: inputLandmarksEMSP
file.label: inputLandmarksEMSP
file.description: The filename for the new subject-specific landmark definition file in the same format produced by Slicer3 (in .fcsv) with the landmarks in the estimated MSP aligned space to be loaded. The detector will only process landmarks not enlisted on the file.

boolean.name: forceHoughEyeDetectorReportFailure
boolean.label: Force Hough Eye Detector Report Failure
boolean.description: Flag indicates whether the Hough eye detector should report failure

parameters.label: Model Override
parameters.description: Override the default values from the model files.

double.name: radiusMPJ
double.description: Search radius for MPJ in unit of mm

double.name: radiusAC
double.description: Search radius for AC in unit of mm

double.name: radiusPC
double.description: Search radius for PC in unit of mm

double.name: radiusVN4
double.description: Search radius for VN4 in unit of mm

parameters.label: Debug Options
parameters.description: Options to control the amount of debugging information that is presented.

file.name: writeBranded2DImage
file.label: writeBranded2DImage
file.description: The filename for the 2D .png branded midline debugging image. This will happen only in conjunction with requesting an outputVolume.

directory.name: resultsDir
directory.label: resultsDir
directory.description: The directory for the debuging images to be written.

integer.name: writedebuggingImagesLevel
integer.label: writedebuggingImagesLevel
integer.description: This flag controls if debugging images are produced. By default value of 0 is no images. Anything greater than zero will be increasing level of debugging images.

integer.name: numberOfThreads
integer.label: Number Of Threads
integer.description: Explicitly specify the maximum number of threads to use.

image.name: atlasVolume
image.label: Atlas Volume Filename
image.description: Atlas volume image to be used for BRAINSFit registration to redefine the final ACPC-aligned transform by registering original input image to the Atlas image. The initial registration transform is created by passing BCD_ACPC_Landmarks and atlasLandmarks to BRAINSLandmarkInitializer. This flag should be used with atlasLandmarks and atlasLandmarkWeights flags. Note that using this flag causes that AC point in the final acpcLandmark file not be exactly placed at 0,0,0 coordinates.

file.name: atlasLandmarks
file.label: Atlas Landmarks
file.description: Atlas landmarks to be used for BRAINSFit registration initialization

file.name: atlasLandmarkWeights
file.label: Atlas Landmarks Weights
file.description: Weights associated with atlas landmarks to be used for BRAINSFit registration initialization
